name: Worm Ninja Stick Hero for Kids
name_original: Worm Ninja Stick Hero for Kids
description:
NO in-app purchase!!!

NO advertisements!!!

Just PURE FUN!!!

Be warned: This game is insanely challenging for KIDS.

******************************************************************************

Worm Ninja Stick Hero Adventure for Kids is an arcade game that will help you focus on generating stick length at exact size to get points.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?
1. Tap and hold anywhere on the screen until you get the right length of the stick.
2. If successful, you get points, repeat Step 1.
3. If unsuccessful, tap the retry button, repeat Step 1.

TIPS:
If you manage to get the length at exact location as the red square, you will get additional 1 point.

Beat your own best score.

Other features:
- Nice graphics animation
- Nice background sound.

Have fun playing the game.

Don't forget to right a review and rate it.

Thanks in advance.
